aspect: 1. Becky Schoenig of St. Louis, Missouri had her 2015 Ford Fusion stolen but got it back with new red rims and detailing.
2. Schoenig responded positively to the alterations and thanked the thieves, opening a smoothie at her restaurant called "The Sexton on Wheels" in honor of the man who returned her car to her.
3. Schoenig's friend Marlene Trice describes her as "vibrant and happy" and "a very special person who loves making people laugh."
